16  struct AuditLogChangeKey {
17  /*
18  * @breif A struct that holds all possible things that changed in an AuditLog.
19  *
20  * To see what would be valid check the discord docs: https://discordapp.com/developers/docs/resources/audit-log#audit-log-change-object-audit-log-change-key
21  *
22  */
23 
24  AuditLogChangeKey() = default;
25 
26  std::string name;
27  std::string icon_hash;
28  std::string splash_hash;
29  discpp::Snowflake owner_id;
30  std::string region;
31  discpp::Snowflake afk_channel_id;
32  int afk_timeout; /* AFK Timeout of current audit log. */
33  int mfa_level;
34  int verification_level;
35  int explicit_content_filter;
36  int default_message_notifications;
37  std::string vanity_url_code;
38  std::vector<discpp::Role> roles_add;
39  std::vector<discpp::Role> roles_remove;
40  int prune_delete_days;
41  bool widget_enabled;
42  discpp::Snowflake widget_channel_id;
43  discpp::Snowflake system_channel_id;
44  int position;
45  std::string topic;
46  int bitrate;
47  std::vector<discpp::Permissions> permission_overwrites;
48  bool nsfw;
49  discpp::Snowflake application_id;
50  int rate_limit_per_user;
51  int permissions;
52  int color;
53  bool hoist;
54  bool mentionable;
55  int allow;
56  int deny;
57  std::string code;
58  discpp::Snowflake channel_id;
59  discpp::Snowflake inviter_id;
60  int max_uses;
61  int uses;
62  int max_age;
63  bool temporary;
64  bool deaf;
65  bool mute;
66  std::string nick;
67  std::string avatar_hash;
68  discpp::Snowflake id;
69  std::string type;
70  bool enable_emoticons;
71  int expire_behavior;
72  int expire_grace_period;
73  };

75  class AuditLogChange {
76  private:
77  public:
78  AuditLogChange() = default;
79  AuditLogChange(rapidjson::Document& json);
80 
81  std::string key;
82  AuditLogChangeKey new_value;
83  AuditLogChangeKey old_value;
84  };
85 
86  enum class AuditLogKey : int {
87  NAME, ICON_HASH, SPLASH_HASH,
88  OWNER_ID, REGION, AFK_CHANNEL_ID,
89  AFK_TIMEOUT, MFA_LEVEL, VERIFICATION_LEVEL,
90  EXPLICIT_CONTENT_FILTER, DEFAULT_MESSAGE_NOTIFICATIONS,
91  VANITY_URL_CODE, ADD, REMOVE, PRUNE_DELETE_DAYS,
92  WIDGET_ENABLED, WIDGET_CHANNEL_ID, SYSTEM_CHANNEL_ID,
93  POSITION, TOPIC, BITRATE, PERMISSION_OVERWRITES,
94  NSFW, APPLICATION_ID, RATE_LIMIT_PER_USER,
95  PERMISSIONS, COLOR, HOIST, MENTIONABLE, ALLOW,
96  DENY, CODE, CHANNEL_ID, INVITER_ID, MAX_USES,
97  USES, MAX_AGE, TEMPORARY, DEAF, MUTE, NICK,
98  AVATAR_HASH, ID, TYPE, ENABLE_EMOTICONS,
99  EXPIRE_BEHAVIOR, EXPIRE_GRACE_PERIOD
100  };
101 
102  inline AuditLogKey StrToKey(const std::string& key) {
103  std::unordered_map<std::string, AuditLogKey> tmp = {
104  {"name", AuditLogKey::NAME}, {"icon_hash", AuditLogKey::ICON_HASH}, {"splash_hash", AuditLogKey::SPLASH_HASH},
105  {"owner_id", AuditLogKey::OWNER_ID}, {"region", AuditLogKey::REGION}, {"afk_channel_id", AuditLogKey::AFK_CHANNEL_ID},
106  {"afk_timeout", AuditLogKey::AFK_TIMEOUT}, {"mfa_level", AuditLogKey::MFA_LEVEL}, {"verification_level", AuditLogKey::VERIFICATION_LEVEL},
107  {"explicit_content_filter", AuditLogKey::EXPLICIT_CONTENT_FILTER}, {"default_message_notifications", AuditLogKey::DEFAULT_MESSAGE_NOTIFICATIONS}, {"vanity_url_code", AuditLogKey::VANITY_URL_CODE},
108  {"$add", AuditLogKey::ADD}, {"$remove", AuditLogKey::REMOVE}, {"prune_delete_days", AuditLogKey::PRUNE_DELETE_DAYS},
109  {"widget_enabled", AuditLogKey::WIDGET_ENABLED}, {"widget_channel_id", AuditLogKey::WIDGET_CHANNEL_ID}, {"system_channel_id", AuditLogKey::SYSTEM_CHANNEL_ID},
110  {"position", AuditLogKey::POSITION}, {"topic", AuditLogKey::TOPIC}, {"bitrate", AuditLogKey::BITRATE},
111  {"permission_overwrites", AuditLogKey::PERMISSION_OVERWRITES}, {"nsfw", AuditLogKey::NSFW}, {"application_id", AuditLogKey::APPLICATION_ID},
112  {"rate_limit_per_user", AuditLogKey::RATE_LIMIT_PER_USER}, {"permissions", AuditLogKey::PERMISSIONS}, {"color", AuditLogKey::COLOR},
113  {"hoist", AuditLogKey::HOIST}, {"mentionable", AuditLogKey::MENTIONABLE}, {"allow", AuditLogKey::ALLOW},
114  {"deny", AuditLogKey::DENY}, {"code", AuditLogKey::CODE}, {"channel_id", AuditLogKey::CHANNEL_ID},
115  {"inviter_id", AuditLogKey::INVITER_ID}, {"max_uses", AuditLogKey::MAX_USES}, {"uses", AuditLogKey::USES},
116  {"max_age", AuditLogKey::MAX_AGE}, {"temporary", AuditLogKey::TEMPORARY}, {"deaf", AuditLogKey::DEAF},
117  {"mute", AuditLogKey::MUTE}, {"nick", AuditLogKey::NICK}, {"avatar_hash", AuditLogKey::AVATAR_HASH},
118  {"id", AuditLogKey::ID}, {"type", AuditLogKey::TYPE}, {"enable_emoticons", AuditLogKey::ENABLE_EMOTICONS},
119  {"expire_behavior", AuditLogKey::EXPIRE_BEHAVIOR}, {"expire_grace_period", AuditLogKey::EXPIRE_GRACE_PERIOD}
120  };
121  return tmp[key];
122  }

178  public:

181 
182  std::string target_id;

188  };

190  class AuditLog {
191  public:

194 
195  std::vector<discpp::Webhook> webhooks;
196  std::vector<discpp::User> users;
